## Getting Started
1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/Chefwise.git`
3. Create a branch: `git checkout -b fix/issue-name`
4. Make your changes
5. Run tests: `npm test`
6. Submit a PR
